markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Giant Bone Skipper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=990)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

While less common than the smaller variety, giant bone skippers are the stuff of nightmares for morticians and graveyard keepers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/BoneSkipper.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Giant Bone Skipper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=990)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), bonesense (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Bonesense** A giant bone skipper identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 115

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +18,
**Damage** 2d10+6 piercing plus marrow rot

**Leaping Charge** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant bone skipper [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) up to 20 feet. It then makes a mandibles Strike, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

**Marrow Rot**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal system; **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 2** enfeebled 2 (1 day); **Stage 3** enfeebled 2 and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 day)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-207" />
name: Giant Bone Skipper
